alert.note: Alert for Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 5:56PM EDT until August 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... East central Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cartersville, or 17 miles southwest of Florence, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Woods Bay State Park, Lynchburg, and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 135 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
